the orbit which in its depth <s>reminds<\s> resembles that 
presented by <u>Caprovis vignei<\u>, or the Argali of Ladak, 
(Coll. Surg. 3778) It is however also paralleled by <s>a skull<\s> that 
in a<s>n old<\s> skull of an old male ovibos in the College of Surgeons 
(3814) The direction of its horncores is downwards and 
forwards. In all other respects both these skulls 
so closely resemble <u>ovibos Moschatus<\u>, that were it not 
for the <s>close apposite coalescence of the horncores 
in the male, and the<\s> points noted above, I should 
believe that they belonged to that animal. Beyond 
all doubt they represent a closely allied species of 
the same genus, ovibos. 
<s><u>Conclusion<\u><\s> <u>Summary<\u>.  In this paper I have attempted 
to establish the following points; first that the
